changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.transitive_relationship_authorization AS SELECT tra.id, r.name AS relationship, tra.is_transitive AS isTransitive, ar.name AS authorized_relationship, tra.notes, res.name AS research, u.name AS updated_by, tra.update_date FROM ruleform.transitive_relationship_authorization tra JOIN ruleform.relationship r ON tra.relationship = r.id JOIN ruleform.relationship ar ON tra.authorized_relationship = ar.id JOIN ruleform.resource u ON tra.updated_by = u.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON tra.research = res.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.transitive_relationship_authorization OWNER TO core;
